mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
mentionedBy.notes: Zoho Projects was a cost-effective alternative with user-friendly interface, Gantt charts, time tracking, and automation features. It was well-suited for employees of different skill levels in small and growing businesses.

mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
